welcome_message_body: Welcome to Panama City, where the charming blend of historic architecture, bustling waterfront, and vibrant cultural scene awaits you. Get ready to explore our beautiful city and immerse yourself in all it has to offer!

restaurants.name: Sea BreezE Barbeque
restaurants.description: Sea BreezE Barbeque is a bbq joint located in Panama City.
restaurants.address: 1139 N Tyndall Pkwy (highway 98), Panama City, FL 32404

restaurants.name: Gary's Oyster Shack
restaurants.description: Gary's Oyster Shack is a seafood restaurant located in Panama City.
restaurants.address: 1320 N Tyndall Pkwy, Panama City, FL 32404

restaurants.name: New York's Famous Pizza and Pasta
restaurants.description: New York's Famous Pizza and Pasta is a pizzeria located in Panama City.
restaurants.address: 1000 E 23rd St (Avenue C), Panama City, FL 32405

restaurants.name: SONIC Drive In
restaurants.description: SONIC Drive In is a fast food restaurant located in Panama City.

restaurants.name: Sakura Japanese Restaurant
restaurants.description: Sakura Japanese Restaurant is a sushi restaurant located in Lynn Haven.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at NW Florida Beaches Int Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at NW Florida Beaches Int Airport serves primarily domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at NW Florida Beaches Int Airport serves primarily international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
